name: Ancient-Archirex - Moray Game Jam 2019
description:
Created as part of the 48 hour Moray Game Jam 2019 by Team 'Openly Game Men' using the theme 'Seeing is believing'.  As a dinosaur, use your spaceship to build a pyramid whilst locals throw stones at you.

Still has a few bugs such as the black sand in webGL.

Designed for an Xbox One Controller.

  • Left Stick (L3) Movement
  • Right Stick (R3) Camera
  • Right Trigger (R2): Tractor Beam
  • Left Trigger (L2): Absorb Tractor Beam Contents (Eat humans)
  • Left / Right Bumper (L1 / R1): Rotate Pieces
  • A button: Hide Help

Mouse / Keyboard controls:

  • WASD for 4 directional movement
  • Arrow Keys to control camera
  • Space Bar to control tractor beam
  • E + R to rotate pieces
